Package org.springframework.integration.nats.support

Class AbstractNatsIntegrationTestSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.integration.nats.support.AbstractNatsIntegrationTestSupport
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultContextConfig, NatsClientReconnectBufferTest, NatsCoreDSLConfigTest, NatsDSLConfigTest, NatsInboundAdapterResiliencyTest, NatsInboundAdapterTest, NatsMessageAsyncProducingHandlerManualTest, NatsMessageAsyncProducingHandlerTest, NatsMessageConcurrentConsumerAcknowledgementTest, NatsMessageConsumerAcknowledgementTest, NatsMessageDrivenChannelAdapterMessageConversionTest, NatsMessageDrivenChannelAdapterNegativeFlowTest, NatsMessageDrivenChannelAdapterRedeliveryTest, NatsMessageDrivenChannelAdapterTest, NatsMessageVersioningAddedFieldTest, NatsMessageVersioningDeletedFieldTest, NatsOutboundAdapterNegativeTest, NatsOutboundAdapterTest, NatsOutputQueueTest, NatsSpringIntegrationScatterGatherTest, NatsSynchronousMessageProducerResilienceTest
    public abstract class AbstractNatsIntegrationTestSupport
extends Object
    Abstract class with helper method to start NATS on docker/local and create streams on demand By default, this class tries to start NATS server in docker. To start the NATS server in local,embedded try setting the property nats_server_host to appropriate value before running the test. Eg. -Dnats_server_host=local, -Dnats_js_enabled=true More info: https://escmconfluence.1dc.com/display/IPG/NATS+-+Integration+Testing+Approach

    • Method Detail

      • getNatsServerURL

        public static String getNatsServerURL()
        Even though "local" NATS server can always be started in specific port, "docker" instance running through Testcontainer approach will expose the running port of NATS server dynamically each time. Hence this property will updated once the NATS server is started in docker and will be available to use in creating NATS connection
        Returns:
        the natsServerURL

      • createStreamConfig

        protected static void createStreamConfig​(@Nonnull
                                         io.nats.client.Connection natsConnection,
                                         @Nonnull
                                         String streamName,
                                         @Nonnull
                                         String subjectName)
                                  throws IOException,
                                         io.nats.client.JetStreamApiException
        This method uses NATS java client API to config remote (stand alone) NATS server with pre-configured STREAM. In PROD this will be configured directly on the server during server set up and booting process of server. This code is just simulate this behavior(stream setup) but using NATS java client API.
        Parameters:
        natsConnection - the natsConnection bean
        streamName - name of the stream to be created
        subjectName - name of the subject to be created
        Throws:
        IOException - covers various communication issues with the NATS server such as timeout or interruption
        io.nats.client.JetStreamApiException - the request had an error related to the data

      • createConsumer

        protected static void createConsumer​(@Nonnull
                                     io.nats.client.Connection natsConnection,
                                     @Nonnull
                                     String streamName,
                                     @Nonnull
                                     io.nats.client.api.ConsumerConfiguration consumerConfiguration)
                              throws IOException,
                                     io.nats.client.JetStreamApiException
        This method uses NATS java client API to config remote (stand alone) NATS server with pre-configured CONSUMER. In PROD this will be configured directly on the server during server set up and booting process of server.
        Parameters:
        natsConnection - the natsConnection bean
        streamName - name of the stream
        consumerConfiguration - the consumer configuration to use.
        Throws:
        IOException - covers various communication issues with the NATS server such as timeout or interruption
        io.nats.client.JetStreamApiException - the request had an error related to the data
